intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ndi satellite yokhala ndi ntchito zaluso: chikumbutso chakunja chotseguka kwa munthu aliyense wokhala ndi moyo padziko lapansi.
intro.paragraph2: Kupyolera mu njira zamakono, aliyense angathe kutumiza dzina la munthu ku Kachisi, kaya munthu amene anamwalira, munthu wamoyo kwambiri, kapena munthu aliyense woyenera kukumbukiridwa.

sculpture.heading: Chosema
sculpture.paragraph1: Zojambulazo zili ndi zinthu zitatu zomwe zimadalirana: satellite yopangidwa makamaka kusunga mabiliyoni a mayina; chosema chapagulu chogawana zambiri ndi satelayiti; ndi tsamba la webusayiti lomwe otenga nawo gawo amatumizira mayina, kuyambira tsopano mpaka atapita, kupita kumwamba.
sculpture.paragraph2: Monga ntchito zosiyanasiyana, Orbital Temple ikhoza kuonedwa ngati chosema chapadera, malo okhalamo. Ndi ntchito ya Artsat.

antenna.heading: Mlongoti Monga Chojambula Pagulu
antenna.paragraph2: Mlongoti womwe udzakhala mukulankhulana mwachindunji ndi orbital satellite ikupangidwa.
antenna.paragraph3: Ndi mawonekedwe onyezimira agolide, kuwonetsa mlengalenga pamwamba pake, ndi poyambira kukondoweza kwa anthu ambiri (kapena ubale wathu ndi zomwe zili 'kumtunda uko').
antenna.paragraph4: Ngakhale kuti ziboliboli sizimayikidwa m'madera ambiri padziko lapansi, Ma Frame athu ochokera ku Earth, omwe pakali pano akuyang'anira satellite, akutumiza mayina panjira iliyonse.
antenna.paragraph5: Thandizani kubweretsa masomphenyawa mumzinda wanuâ€”kukhazikitsa ziboliboli za mlongoti zomwe zimalimbikitsa kukambirana za kufufuza kwa mlengalenga, zojambulajambula, ndi malo omwe timagawana nawo ku cosmos. Dziwani zambiri zakuthandizira polojekitiyi .

imageCaptions.riseNy: Orbital Temple mumlengalenga. 3D yoperekedwa ndi RiseNY&Partners.
imageCaptions.mercosul:
Kukhazikitsidwa kwa kachisi wa Orbital ku Mercosul Biennial, ku Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Chithunzi chojambulidwa ndi Clara Marques.
